extendedInfo.description: **ATTENTION** Installation problems?  Please read below.What is a doo-dad?  A doo-dad is a widget that sole purpose is to add a little bling to your screen without having to change your background or theme.  Do you have the perfect wallpaper or theme but it is missing some little something to set it off?  That's where doo-dads come in.  Doo-dads come in various sizes and put very little drain on your battery.To Install:1. Purchase, download and install2. Go to blank area on screen and long hold (press and hold)3. When menu comes up select Widgets4. Look for the doo-dad you installed and select itYour doo-dad should appear on the screen.  If you would like to move it around just press and long hold until you see the doo-dad increase in size then move it to where you want it.Be sure to check out our other items.  Just search for doo-dads in the android market.Everybody's screen needs a doo-dad!Enjoy!Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License.keywords: droid, doo-dads, doodads, dodads, decoration, graffiti, graphics, awesome, art, sticker, decal, eye candy, personalization, dml, dark matter lab

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: The doodad is under your widgets! Wish the word \"doodads\" was more easily seen on the little guy. But still cute.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boring!!
reviews.comment: The pictures under the app description are very misleading...there is only the one robot dude with the \"I love doo dad\" shirt on. All the other robot outfits must be PURCHASED in seperate apps! Also, the robot doesn\'t wave or make any sounds, just a stupid robot wearing an \"I love doo dads\" shirt. I certainly do NOT love doo dads! Lol...
reviews.author: Brooke Howell

reviews.comment: doo-dads Very nice! Keep them coming!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Omg it doesent let me open this thing :( nooooooooo!
